articles.title: Minnesota: 200 anglers rescued from broken ice chunk
articles.description: The ice broke on Upper Red Lake, a popular ice fishing destination in the state of Minnesota.
articles.content:
Around 200 people have been rescued after they were stranded on a large chunk of ice that broke away in a Minnesota lake.
